    • moveTowerOntoIsland

      public void moveTowerOntoIsland(int numOfTowerToMove) throws EndGameException
      Moves the towers from the school board to the island.
      Parameters:
      numOfTowerToMove - is equal to the dimension of the island.
      Throws:
      EndGameException - if the player has not other towers on the school board so the game is ended.

    • moveTowerOntoSchoolBoard

      public void moveTowerOntoSchoolBoard(int numOfTowerToMove)
      Removes the towers from the island and put them into the school board.
      Parameters:
      numOfTowerToMove - is equal to the dimension of the island.

    • addStudentIntoDiningRoom

      public void addStudentIntoDiningRoom(Color color) throws IllegalClientInputException
      Adds a student in the dining room of the school board.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to insert.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if the dining room corresponding to that color is already full.

    • addStudentIntoEntrance

      public void addStudentIntoEntrance(Color color)
      Adds a student at the entrance of the school board.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to add at the entrance.

    • getStudentsNumber

      public int getStudentsNumber(Color color)
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the students.
      Returns:
      the number of students in the dining room with the color passed in parameter.

    • removeStudentFromEntrance

      public void removeStudentFromEntrance(Color student) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a student of a specified color from entrance.
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when there are no students of the specified color in the entrance.

      public boolean isEntranceEmpty()
